title: test_clone.test_clone_unborn_head_sub fails on crippled FS

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

labels.name: crippled-filesystems
labels.description: Issue concerned with operation on crippled filesystems, regardless of OS

body:
Happened with gh-4708 running on an exFAT SSD.

This is particularly bad, as it affects `core` code.
```
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_clone.test_clone_unborn_head_sub
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mih/env/datalad3-dev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 715, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/core/distributed/tests/test_clone.py", line 1126, in test_clone_unborn_head_sub
    "sub", result_xfm="datasets", return_type="item-or-list")
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/distribution/dataset.py", line 498, in apply_func
    return f(**kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 494, in eval_func
    return return_func(generator_func)(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 482, in return_func
    results = list(results)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 413, in generator_func
    allkwargs):
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 552, in _process_results
    for res in results:
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/distribution/get.py", line 801, in __call__
    description):
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/distribution/get.py", line 501, in _install_targetpath
    ds, target_path, reckless, refds_path, description=description):
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/distribution/get.py", line 383, in _install_necessary_subdatasets
    description=description):
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/distribution/get.py", line 302, in _install_subds_from_flexible_source
    **kwargs):
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/core/distributed/clone.py", line 528, in clone_dataset
    description)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/core/distributed/clone.py", line 754, in postclonecfg_annexdataset
    repo._init(description=description)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 1274, in _init
    annex_options=opts)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 1097, in _run_annex_command
    **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/cmd.py", line 143, in run_gitcommand_on_file_list_chunks
    results.append(func(cmd, *args, **kwargs))
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/cmd.py", line 504, in run
    **results,
datalad.support.exceptions.CommandError: CommandError: 'git-annex init -c annex.dotfiles=true -c annex.retry=3' failed with exitcode 1 under /media/mih/Samsung_T5/tmp/datalad_temp_test_clone_unborn_head_subh2nbemzo/b/sub
```
